review: A thorough professional. Dealt with me with utmost respect. I have a long history of gynecological issues and he took time to understand the same and did not for once seemed to be in a hurry. I felt ever so confident with his approach to treatment and I highly recommend Dr Rahul Roy Choudhury to all. Thank you Sir!
